entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
